**If you are trying to reinstall SkyClient because of the Mods throws an error, don't.** It has never helped and will never help. 
Try to actually fix the issue instead of reinstalling for the 10th time.

SkyClient installs Forge for you. You shouldn't need it pre-installed

**`How to access the SkyClient folder:`**
**Windows**: Hit `Windows Key + R` and type in `%appdata%`. Open the `.minecraft` folder, then go to the `skyclient` folder.
**Mac**: On the bar at the top of your screen in Finder, click Go, then click Go to Folder and type `~/Library/Application Support/Minecraft/skyclient`, then hit enter.
**Linux**: if you use Linux and you don't know this, stop using Linux.


**`Exit Code 0:`**
Go into the `logs` folder and upload `latest.log`
If you don't see that file, look for it. Any other file will be useless.

**`Exit Code 1 (or anything other than 0):`**
Go into the crash-reports folder and upload the latest current crashlog.

If you are crashing, we need the following:

``How to access the SkyClient folder:``
Windows: Hit ``Windows Key + R`` and type in ``%appdata%``. Open the ``.minecraft`` folder, then go to the ``skyclient`` folder.
Mac: On the bar at the top of your screen in Finder, click Go, then click Go to Folder and type ``~/Library/Application Support/Minecraft/skyclient``, then hit enter.
Linux: if you use Linux and you don't know this, there's something wrong with you


``Exit Code 0:``
Go into the ``logs`` folder and upload ``latest.log``
If you don't see that file, look for it. Any other file will be useless.

``Exit Code 1 (or anything other than 0):``
Go into the crash-reports folder and upload the latest current crashlog.

Use sk1ers old animations, as it's the one of the best *(if not best)* mod for 1.7 animations.
After joining head to <#958820675106267207> to get access, and then head to <#958820495631999046> to find the installation for the 1.7 animations mod.  *the channels should show up as `#deleted-channel` if you're not in the server* 
 discord.gg/sk1er

Set CTM to fast or off.
`escape` -> `options` -> `video settings` -> `quality` -> `Connected Textures: FAST or OFF`

For the new launcher, you have to set your profile manually. 
Create a new installation with the version `1.8.9-forge1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9` and the game directory `C:/Users/YOUR_PC_LOGIN_NAME/AppData/Roaming/.minecraft/skyclient` https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/780206481596350486/814935220637794365/unknown.png 

The icon for the profile if you’d like can be found in <https://github.com/nacrt/SkyblockClient-REPO/blob/main/files/images/skyclient128apng.png>

For video instructions, watch this video:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/887818760126345246/919984824733794354/how_to_add_an_installation_profile.mp4

Hypixel has removed the locations of Griffin Burrows from the public API. As such, any and all mods that formerly touted features of finding Griffin Burrows (Skytils most significantly) no longer produces waypoints via an API search, and any mods that claim to do so (regardless of distribution method) should be considered too good to be true until Griffin Burrows locations are confirmed to return to the public Hypixel API.

In the meantime, you can enable Skytils' Griffin Burrows ***particle-based*** waypoints via `/st config`.

The old launcher can be installed from here:
<https://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftInstaller.msi>\__If you don't use Microsoft Windows, this message does not apply to you as `.msi` files cannot be opened outside of Microsoft Windows.__

To fix low dungeon FPS:
1. Make sure you don't have the mod SBCustomMobTex installed.
2. Disable the dungeon map in `/neumap`. If you still want a dungeon map, use the one from `/skytils` > Dungeons > Dungeon Map.
3. Please make a ticket in <#931624995522773032>, instead of asking for help in general chat.
